reviewText: Great set for Twisted Sister fans. The older shows are awesome, my only complaint is that I wish there was footage from the Stay Hungry tour. I also wish there was more pro shot footage of them in general, they were a great live band and Dee had an unbelievable stage presence. If you're a fan of the band and don't already have this, there's no reason not to get it for only $30 because live video footage of classic Twisted Sister is the best way to experience the band (outside of actually attending a concert of course, but unfortunately they recently retired. I think they're coming out with another live DVD from the last tour though!)
good DVD to own if you liked 80's rock . . good memories
Great live shows from one of the best hard rock bands and heavy metal front men in the business!!!
Loved them all! Brought back memories!!!
WORTH THE MONEY! GREAT DVD SET! TWISTED SISTER RULES!
All the Twisted Sister live you could want and need is all right here from the ground up.....yeah

Bought this as a gift for Son who got into Twisted Sister recently. This Box set is DVD's only, no cd's, so no albums to listen to.. you have to watch the dvd's. Video quality of recordings is low qaulity and sound quality is ok. I would only reccommend this for true hard-core twisted sister fans, otherwise get the greatest hits album and call it a day. It also came with cheap made-in-china souveniers, that are pointless, again, go for the greatest hits album!
The Best travel through time with Twisted Sister. Deff. worth the money! Stop Reading and Buy! you will not be disappointed.
